trans-unit.source: Use Hadoop Pig with PowerShell in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use Hadoop Pig with PowerShell in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to submit Pig jobs to a Hadoop cluster on HDInsight using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to submit Pig jobs to a Hadoop cluster on HDInsight using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Run Pig jobs using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Run Pig jobs using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This document provides an example of using Azure PowerShell to submit Pig jobs to a Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This document provides an example of using Azure PowerShell to submit Pig jobs to a Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Pig allows you to write MapReduce jobs by using a language (Pig Latin,) that models data transformations, rather than map and reduce functions.
trans-unit.target: Pig allows you to write MapReduce jobs by using a language (Pig Latin,) that models data transformations, rather than map and reduce functions.

trans-unit.source: This document does not provide a detailed description of what the Pig Latin statements used in the examples do.
trans-unit.target: This document does not provide a detailed description of what the Pig Latin statements used in the examples do.

trans-unit.source: For information about the Pig Latin used in this example, see <link><linkText>Use Pig with Hadoop on HDInsight</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about the Pig Latin used in this example, see <link><linkText>Use Pig with Hadoop on HDInsight</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: To complete the steps in this article, you will need the following.
trans-unit.target: To complete the steps in this article, you will need the following.

trans-unit.source: An Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: An Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Get Azure free trial</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Get Azure free trial</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: A workstation with Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: A workstation with Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Install and use Azure PowerShell</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Install and use Azure PowerShell</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Run Pig jobs using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Run Pig jobs using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell provides cmdlets that allow you to remotely run Pig jobs on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell provides cmdlets that allow you to remotely run Pig jobs on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this is accomplished by using REST calls to <link><linkText>WebHCat</linkText><title></title></link> (formerly called Templeton) running on the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Internally, this is accomplished by using REST calls to <link><linkText>WebHCat</linkText><title></title></link> (formerly called Templeton) running on the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: The following cmdlets are used when running Pig jobs on a remote HDInsight cluster:
trans-unit.target: The following cmdlets are used when running Pig jobs on a remote HDInsight cluster:

trans-unit.source: Add-AzureAccount: Authenticates Azure PowerShell to your Azure Subscription
trans-unit.target: Add-AzureAccount: Authenticates Azure PowerShell to your Azure Subscription

trans-unit.source: New-AzureHDInsightPigJobDefinition: Creates a new job definition by using the specified Pig Latin statements
trans-unit.target: New-AzureHDInsightPigJobDefinition: Creates a new job definition by using the specified Pig Latin statements

trans-unit.source: Start-AzureHDInsightJob: Sends the job definition to HDInsight, starts the job, and returns a job object that can be used to check the status of the job
trans-unit.target: Start-AzureHDInsightJob: Sends the job definition to HDInsight, starts the job, and returns a job object that can be used to check the status of the job

trans-unit.source: Wait-AzureHDInsightJob: Uses the job object to check the status of the job.
trans-unit.target: Wait-AzureHDInsightJob: Uses the job object to check the status of the job.

trans-unit.source: It will wait until the job has completed, or the wait time has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: It will wait until the job has completed, or the wait time has been exceeded.

trans-unit.source: Get-AzureHDInsightJobOutput: Used to retrieve the output of the job
trans-unit.target: Get-AzureHDInsightJobOutput: Used to retrieve the output of the job

trans-unit.source: The following steps demonstrate how to use these cmdlets to run a job on your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The following steps demonstrate how to use these cmdlets to run a job on your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Using an editor, save the following code as pigjob.ps1.
trans-unit.target: Using an editor, save the following code as pigjob.ps1.

trans-unit.source: You must replace CLUSTERNAME with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: You must replace CLUSTERNAME with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Open a new Azure PowerShell command prompt.
trans-unit.target: Open a new Azure PowerShell command prompt.

trans-unit.source: Change directories to the location of the pigjob.ps1 file, then use the following command to run the script:
trans-unit.target: Change directories to the location of the pigjob.ps1 file, then use the following command to run the script:

trans-unit.source: When the job completes, it should return information similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: When the job completes, it should return information similar to the following:

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: If no information is returned when the job completes, an error may have occurred during processing.
trans-unit.target: If no information is returned when the job completes, an error may have occurred during processing.

trans-unit.source: To view error information for this job, add the following command to the end of the pigjob.ps1 file, save it, and then run it again.
trans-unit.target: To view error information for this job, add the following command to the end of the pigjob.ps1 file, save it, and then run it again.

trans-unit.source: This will return the information that was written to STDERR on the server when you ran the job, and it may help determine why the job is failing.
trans-unit.target: This will return the information that was written to STDERR on the server when you ran the job, and it may help determine why the job is failing.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Summary
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Summary

trans-unit.source: As you can see, Azure PowerShell provides an easy way to run Pig jobs on an HDInsight cluster, monitor the job status, and retrieve the output.
trans-unit.target: As you can see, Azure PowerShell provides an easy way to run Pig jobs on an HDInsight cluster, monitor the job status, and retrieve the output.
